text: A National library is established by the government of a nation to serve as the pre-eminent repository of information for that country. Some national entities which are not independent but who wish to preserve their particular culture, have established a national library with all the attributes of such institutions, such as legal deposit. Unlike public libraries, they rarely allow citizens to borrow books respectively. == National libraries of countries == Country Country Bangladesh National Library of Bangladesh (বাংলাদেশ জাতীয় গ্রন্থাগার) Dhaka Canada Library and Archives Canada (Bibliothèque et Archives Canada) Ottawa Greece National Library of Greece (Εθνική Βιβλιοθήκη της Ελλάδος) Athens India National Library of India Kolkata Ireland National Library of Ireland Leabharlann Náisiúnta na hÉireann Dublin Pakistan National Library of Pakistan ("قومی کتب خانہ پاکستان") Islamabad Palestine Khalidi Library Old Jerusalem United Kingdom National Library of the UK London United States Library of Congress Washington D.C. ==Related pages== * Library ==References== Category:National libraries Category:National symbols
